about_the_game:
Get exclusive benefits for the 2025 season!

This pack includes a limited-time mount only available this season, a Season DK Support Box, and an EXP Improve Potion 100%. Ride your unique mount across the 2025 season and boost your growth with the DK Support Box and EXP Improve Potion for faster progression than ever!

Contents

  • Gold Fairy Dragon (Unlimited) 
    - The item is a mount and a consumable.

  • Season DK Support Box (1ea)
    - This item can be opened 30 times to randomly obtain items and is consumable.

  • EXP Improve Potion 100% (10ea)
    - The item is consumable.

Notices

- This DLC contains consumable items and is non-refundable.

- The DLC will be instantly delivered to your DK Shop Inventory.

- Each account can only purchase each DLC once.

- DLC contents will be maintained during season3 (about 10 months)

* Season 3 started on Dec 24, 2024

- DLC contents are subject to change after prior notice.
